verses.verse: Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> is the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine<s%> [better] <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> of a <S%H2156>branch<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%>?

"Can <S%H6086>wood<s%> be <S%H3947>taken<s%> from it to <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4399>anything,<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> can [men] <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3489>peg<s%> from it on which to <S%H8518>hang<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>?

<S%H2009>"If<s%> it has been <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel,<s%> [and] the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of its <S%H7098>ends,<s%> and its <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H8432>part<s%> has <S%H2787>been<s%> <S%H2787>charred,<s%> is it [then] <S%H6743>useful<s%> for <S%H4399>anything<s%>?

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> while it is <S%H8549>intact,<s%> it is not <S%H6213>made<s%> into <S%H4399>anything.<s%> <S%H637>How<s%> <S%H637>much<s%> <S%H637>less,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> has <S%H398>consumed<s%> it and it is <S%H2787>charred,<s%> can it <S%H5750>still<s%> be <S%H6213>made<s%> into <S%H4399>anything!<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> 'As the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H1612>vine<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H784>fire<s%> for <S%H402>fuel,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> have I <S%H5414>given<s%> up the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

and I <S%H5414>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against them. [Though] they have <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H784>fire,<s%> yet the <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>consume<s%> them. Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H7760>set<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> against them.

'Thus I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H4603>acted<s%> <S%H4604>unfaithfully,<s%>'" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>
